description:
WarChess is a Modified Game of Chess where you can place your pieces where you want on the chess board on two or four lines players be masked by a Fog of War to do Infinites strategies and surprise your opponent

 Result :

  • Infinite Strategy
  • Mor Fun
  • Classics Chess Progression

Modes :

  • WarChess : Place pieces on two lines on the chess board
  • Simple Chess : Classics Chess
  • WarChess 4L : Place pieces on 4 lines on the chess board

Fonctionalities :

  • In Game Tchat
  • Out Game Tchat
  • Mondial Classement
  • Google Id 
  • Pseudo Id
  • Privates Games
  • Multiplayers Games
  • AI Games
  • Very Good Design

The Paid version add :

  • WarChess 3L : Place pieces on 3 lines on the chess board
  • WarChess M : Two moves of pieces with the same piece, Place on 2 lines
  • WarChess ML : Two moves of pieces with différent pieces, Place on 2 lines
  • Chess M : Two moves of pieces with same piece, Classic Chess
  • Chess ML : Two moves of pieces with differents pieces, Classic Chess
  • WarChess King : The King Keep the same position, Place on two lines

Do your Strategy by droping your pieces where you want  

And In-Game play like Chess Rules
